Summary Note:
The RM has known Christensen Jensen Hansen since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Christensen Jensen Hansen is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Christensen Jensen Hansen is married to Sofia. Their child is  named Louise.
Education Background:
Christensen earned his secondary school diploma from Skt. Knuds Gymnasium in 1997.
Christensen completed his university education at CBS International Business School in 2003.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 23 years, Christensen Jensen Hansen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Christensen Jensen Hansen began his professional journey as a Analyst at KKR & Co. Danmark A/S in 2002, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Associate at Advent International Danmark A/S in 2004, further expanding his skill set.
He spent 5 years working as a Investment Director at EQT Partners A/S, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He worked as a Partner at KKR & Co. Danmark A/S from 2014 till now, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 4860000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3851000 DKK.

He inherited a significant sum of 11770000 DKK from his mother, a respected Corporate Lawyer, in 2009, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
